name: Hello From Darkness
description: Hello From Darkness - a meme horror, made in 3D graphics with a first-person view. The action takes place in a gloomy city where everything has gone crazy. To win, you need to collect the necessary items, complete some tasks and just survive.

name: Canon: Legend of the New Gods
description: Originally called Feng Shen Ying Jie Chuan, Canon - Legends of the New Gods is a strategy RPG originally for the Sega Genesis and Mega Drive consoles.

name: Galactic Crew II
description: Galactic Crew II is a roguelike space exploration game inspired by FTL and the classic XCOM games. Explore a hostile galaxy with your valorous crew from its center to the outer reaches of space, clawing your way up from a nobody to a galactic pioneer through colonization, commerce, and combat.

name: Ghost of the Seas
description: Ghost of The Seas is a first-person open adventure game created by one-man developer using Unity Engine, where the player have to find the Harkenon Wheel to escape from Seaworld.

name: Gear Stalker
description: VR post apocalyptic giant robot hunting game

name: Inversion
description: Control the main character and test your skills!

name: Starseed
description:
Starseed aims to slightly twist the peaceful, calming farm sim archetype. "A farm sim with dark undertones and an isolated atmosphere" - would be a fitting description.

It is still, in sense, a peaceful sim without combat, but this time there's no relationships to build, your interactions are with your helper robots and with mission control back on Earth. You are millions of miles from the people you're trying to save.

name: Consortya
description: The game features social spaces where real musical artists will be performing live music. The adventure and combat bolster this experience and allow Balancers to collect hidden songs from upcoming performers. Consortya is being designed and developed by Andy Martin of indie studio Moonlight Games, LLC.

name: Your Fear
description: You must find your daughter and wife in a hospital where everyone turns into a light sensitive monster caused by an odd epidemic.

name: Gogoo
description: Take up the challenge and face fast pace platforming in Gogoo! you need to master the technique of jumping and timing. You are the hero! help yourself through the ingenious and tricky levels.

name: Flying Angel
description: "Flying Angel" is a vertical scrolling flying shooting game with futuristic technology graphics.

name: Ronald's Run
description: Help Ronald use his magic to defeat the crazy nanoos. There are 3 levels to choose from and you can collect as many coins as possible. A fun single-player as Ronald gains experience with every nanoo vanquished.

name: Deadly Way
description: Deadly Way is a super hardcore first-person game.

name: SCP: Forgotten Facility
description: SCP: Forgotten Facility is a 20th century WW2-Era based horror game revolving around the SCP universe. Play multiplayer with others in a pvp team based game in a fight to flee the facility. Explore over 15 SCP-Objects and 7 playable SCP's.

name: Quantum Runners
description: Quantum Runners - a futuristic, fast paced, interplanetary themed mixed genre 3D Space Racer and Shooter.

name: City Sniper
description: This is a first person shooting game. The player plays a soldier,Players are surrounded by enemies, and they are free to explore the surrounding areas,Players can dodge the enemy's attack, or kill the enemy to survive as much as possible.

name: Two Coins
description: Two Coins is a time-traveling action adventure. You play as Richard, a guy with a completely normal life. He finds a magazine about forests and wilderness at work and is inspired to go on a forest trip.

name: Mealmates
description: Get your friends together or play by yourself. It's a minigame mayhem!

name: The Enemy Below
description: Escape from the depths of a top-secret research facility as you slash through creatures like giant mutant aliens, robot demons, and countless other experiments gone wrong. Inspired by classic games like Half-Life, Quake, and Doom, The Enemy Below raises the bar of what a modern retro-FPS can be.

name: The Station: Escape Room
description: Escape the confinement of the space station and restart the systems to gain freedom. Cooperative Escape Room style game to challenge yourself and your friends. Seven rooms to solve the amazing and challenging mysteries before the timer runs out!

name: Pteranodon's Flight: The Flying Dinosaur Game
description: Welcome to Pteranodon's Flight! Dip, dive, swoop and soar as you hunt for prey, weave through jagged rocks and brave an erupting volcano! Be careful, though! You might actually learn something!

name: Firelight Fantasy: Phoenix Crew
description: Firelight Fantasy: Phoenix Crew is a spectacular third-person sword fighting game based on Scandinavian mythology

name: Wild Country
description: Welcome to Wild Country, the cozy-competitive card game with city-building elements. Compete against quirky animals in a competition to become the next Mayor of Sun City. Collect cards, challenge friends and furry foes in the single-player campaign, and play online in ranked and unranked matches.

name: Crystal Sequence
description: Challenge your mind with this amazing puzzles! Try to find the Crystal Sequence to advance to the next levels.

name: R-Naught
description: R-Naught is in the style of a classic JRPG with turn-based battles, level up mechanics, and skills systems that should feel familiar. Set in a dystopian sci-fi / horror world with an ambitious storyline and memorable characters.

name: Yachu Dice
description: Yachu Dice a tabletop dice game based on Yahtzeesupports LAN multiplayer up to 4 players

name: Color Breakers
description: Color Breakers is a chaotic 1-4 player local and online multiplayer co-op coloring game where players need to work together in each of the levels to complete as many paintings as possible.

name: Waterpark Simulator
description: Enjoy typical waterpark amusements in Waterpark Simulator. Use Slides in first person view, immerse into summer atmosphere or listen to calming guitar music. A great way to bring your summer back or enjoy when stuck at home! Walk around in the game, enjoy the view and relax on the island.

name: GridMath
description: relax while organizing all the numerical grids solving countless mathematical problems in the minimalist world of GridMath.

name: Ai Yu Ming De Bi Duan
description: Sin descripción

name: Pebble Witch
description: Play as a witch. Talk to pebbles. Reflect on the melancholy of becoming. Sit more. Walk. More walking. Have a crush on your burly teacher. Enjoy a lovely day in an Australian beach town.

name: Harlow
description: Two clumsy robots plan a surprise party for the frozen colonists they stranded in this atmospheric platformer.

name: Bubble Tea: Game for Thinking and Imagination
description: Let's find legendary bubble tea to cure grandpa! This is a puzzle RPG Maker game that take you on an adventurous journey across the world, through various dangers to find legendary treasures according to Grandpa's orders.

name: Dreamlight
description: Dreamlight is a 2D exploration sandbox with a survival aspects and a random world generation

name: Redneck Party
description: Hello Fellas! I'm talkin' Redneck Party. Show off your skills as you fix and upgrade some serious horsepower. Customise your wheels by painting body colors, selecting stickers and much more. All brakes are out. Enjoy the party!

name: AI Hunter
description: Hunter 1 game is a shooting game.When the female hunter hits the rabbit and fox in the deep forest gets some points. When the score reaches a certain value, the game will reward the player with virtual gold coins and diamonds.Players press the left mouse key to let female hunters shoot.

name: Cladmen
description: What is a person ready for when he finds out that his mother is dying?Is he ready to step on the road of crime to save her?

name: The Arena Guy
description: It's a really hardcore challenge. How long can you survive on this arena?

name: Little Monkeys Eat Bananas
description: Run, jump, cling, and climb your way through this monkey-themed 2D Platformer. Jump on baddies to defeat them as you collect bananas to gain lives, regain health, or THROW AT THE BADDIES?!? And don't forget to collect the hidden Golden Banana Coins in each level to unlock a special secret...

name: Hostile Mars
description: Hostile Mars is a Tower-Defense Factory-Building game. You must create efficient supply chains, salvage destroyed enemies, and upgrade structures to support your gigantic cannons that defend your base against thousands of enemies.

name: Eye, caramba!
description: Got a keen eye? Then try to solve these colorful soothing puzzles while listening to relaxing music!

name: Hard Driver
description: Incredibly beautiful and dynamic Side-Scroller, where you control a car that flew into the air with a super-cool driver must Dodge obstacles, flying past clouds, shooting off flying debris and collecting various Goodies on the way home!

name: Guardians of Greyrock
description: A tactical, turn-based high-fantasy adventure card game like no other. Take charge of an elite party of heroes to search out and purge the realm of darkness. Save the ailing Kingdom of Greyrock... in this life or from beyond death itself!

name: Ragnarok Chess
description: The classical game of chess... now played in the beautiful Viking Lands! Play chess against your friends or versus the computer, unlock new scenarios and chess pieces and prove yourself to be the most fearless Viking alive!

name: Le Frenchie
description: A 2.5D Action-Adventure Platform Game

name: Vivian's Kurse
description: Defeat Vivian's shadow to reclaim her soul from the Dark Tome.

name: Super Monk War Z
description: "Super Monk War Z" is a 2D horizontal shooting game that consists of 4 stages. Take advantage of three types of formation and a large amount of Do it or be done Barrage shooting !! Shoot the approaching enemy! Hit! Kill!

name: Inglorious Aztecs
description: Inglorious Aztecs is a 2-4 player online multiplayer game centered around fast-paced versus matches with a high fun factor. Mine the terrain with your Pickaxe, block incoming bullets with blocks placement, and most importantly; Be the last player to survive!

name: Blocky Ball
description: Blocky Ball is a brand new take on a classic concept! Take on your friends in a 1v1 or 2v2 to fly through the sky and and score points against each other! This soccer style online multiplayer game provides quick effortless matches from random opponents or your friends!

name: Ratomon
description: Ratomon is a medieval top-down adventure to stop the Plague. Investigate random generated dungeons, eliminate rat hordes and other villains, who stand behind the disease.

name: Stay Lit, Find Radio
description: Stay Lit, Find Radio is a survival, clue seeking, ghost avoiding, radio finding simulator game based in a haunted forest. It is a slow burn game for people who enjoy walking around and finding clues during the day, and being haunted during the night.

name: A Tale for Anna
description: Join Anna on an amazing adventure to a magical world full of puzzles and fairytale characters!

name: Hotel Life: A Resort Simulator
description: You are the manager of a hotel in an idyllic location. Build, design and develop your hotel, while creating unforgettable memories for your guests through expert management and by offering exceptional entertainment.

name: Ozark
description: A search and rescue gone wrong, crash landing in a remote mountain. A derelict facility, signals lost. Nothing is quite as it seems. Fight for your life in this side-scrolling action adventure and unravel the mysteries that lie beneath.

name: Lone King
description: Simultaneous-turn-based tactics with a single mech versus a small army. Simple controls, deep gameplay. Play the arcade mode for free or support development by purchasing the story mode. Participate in early access to suggest new modes, gameplay changes, and other content to be added.

name: Doggo Quest
description: Doggo Quest is a quirky watercolored RPG featuring a lost dog trying to find its way home.

name: Union
description: Union is a minimal puzzle game.

name: Cold Breath
description: Cold, wolves, bears and more.A struggle for survival in the north of Norway. Improve your skills and fight the challenges in this nature!

name: Survived
description: First Person Shooter tower defensive strategy game, gather materials, build, and see how long you can survive!

name: Vaporwave Road VR
description: Drive a car on an endless road, listen to music, and watch the scenery. This is a relaxing game, you can import local music, in the game you can only listen to music and enjoy the scenery. This game is completely made for the VR experience and contains 7 music.

name: Gravity Defied: Trial Racing
description:
Race to the finish line as fast as you can without crashing.
By leaning forward and backward you can adjust the rotation of your bike.
By landing on both wheels after jumping, your bike won't crash as easily.

Enjoy the game!

name: Pinball FX3: Zen Classics
description: Zen Classics features a dazzling collection of four Zen Studios original pinball designs all upgraded for Pinball FX3. Shaman, El Dorado, Tesla and V12 have been re-mastered with updated graphics, superior ball physics and deep social features.

name: Anno 1800: Seat of Power
description:
The 1st DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 2 Pass.

Take the industrial revolution further with Anno 1800 Seat of Power. Show off the power of your city with a prestigious palace and government departments to boost your economy with a variety of policies.

name: Project Rayssus
description: Mechanic Action MMOTPS Project Rayssus Customize your own Rayssus and use your weapons, actions, and skills to be active on the battlefield.

name: Anno 1800: Bright Harvest
description:
The 2nd DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 2 Pass.

Take your empire’s farming efforts to the next level with Anno 1800’s Bright Harvest DLC.

name: Graviteam Tactics: Mius Front - Under the Cruel Star
description: Battle south of Kharkov after its first liberation in February 1943. The Soviet 6th gds Cavalry corps and tanks of 201 TBde conduct mobile operations behind the enemy lines.

name: Rabbit Hole
description: An ancient evil has descended upon the rural town of Rabbit Hole. Now Shaun Turner not only has to untangle a twisted web of supernatural events and mysteries to save his family but also escape from the hellish remains of his hometown.

name: Anno 1800: Land of Lions
description:
The 3rd DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 2 Pass.

Produce new trade goods to satisfy the needs of your two local residential tiers: The selfless Shepherds and traditionalist Elders.

name: Hirilun
description:
Hirilun is a time-trial-based first-person platformer in which you will explore a dark and strange city. Run, jump, glide, sprint and dash to achieve the best possible time, and compete with your friends in worldwide leaderboards.

Hirilun is a dark and strange city, full of hidden places and high buildings. Although anyone can get in, only the fastest will achieve fame.

name: Newfound Courage: Winter's Fair
description: It's Winter's Fair in Silverpine and for the first time since before the time that wasn't counted - it's snowing. Strange events occur as someone... or something seems determined to ruin the town's most important annual event. Will Alex and his friends save the day? Come home to Silverpine and find out.

name: Crowhille: Detective Case Files VR
description: Play as detective Wales and get amazed in this Virtual reality game

name: Euro Fishing: The Moat
description: This 10-acre lake is located in the grounds of a famous Welsh castle, providing a spectacular background for your catch shots! The Moat contains Carp and Catfish up to 55lbs as well as specimen-sized Tench, Roach, Bream and Perch. The Moat also contains a new species of fish - Rudd up to 3lbs.

name: Alekon
description: Wander around the Realm of Fiction to photograph dozens of whimsical creatures, Then befriend them through unique quests and minigames, from snowflake design, to tuning and playing crystal harps, to organizing parties.

name: Overboard!
description:
July, 1935. A murder has been committed aboard the SS Hook, eight hours out from New York.

Only one problem: you did it.

Can you get away with murder?

name: Escape Together
description: Escape Together or Die Trying

name: Sunset 20 Drone Racer
description: Fly your drone up mountains, underwater and in space, racing against your rivals and firing missiles at them in this casual yet skillful arcade drone racing game.

name: Farming Engine
description: Can you build the farm of your dreams? Grow plants, feed your animals, ride your horse, craft tools and constructions, and explore the map! Become the best farmer of your town in this simulation game.

name: Weltreich: Political Strategy Simulator
description: Rule the state, lead politics, strategize in this simulator. You can choose your wn political direction.

name: Freiwillig
description: Join the ranks of the volunteer fire department in Tübingen, Germany, and defend the city from evil-doers through arcade puzzle action! Use the falling blocks to create reaction chains for big points!

name: The Last Saviour
description: A first-person shooter in the style of survival and science fiction. Before you stretches a huge unexplored forest. Which is beautiful during the day and very scary at night. But be careful! At every step you can expect a werewolf who can take over your mind.

name: Notre-Dame de Paris: Journey Back in Time
description: Ubisoft proposes a Virtual Reality visit of Notre-Dame de Paris in real time, based on the XVIIIth century reconstitution from the videogame Assassin’s Creed : Unity.

name: War of the Mars
description: War in Mars has evolved, and has online FPS on Virtual Reality

name: Pandemic Isolation
description: In this game you have to help the main character to hold on in self-isolation with limited resources. Every day you face a difficult choice: how to eke out your groceries, whose request you should respond to, and who is to be left without a piece of bread.

name: Fillit
description: Filit is a frantic 1 to 4 player casual action game based and inspired by the nostalgic Xonix and Volfied adding a unique mechanics and new gameplay. Grab your areas while avoiding your enemies and bad bosses.

name: PSweet
description: Date productivity applications in a retro, hand-drawn dating simulator set in a fictional operating system that definitely doesn't have a horrible secret.

name: Surreatripus
description: Surreatripus is an action platformer with an unusual abstract psychedelic atmosphere. QUEST mode -> Travel through surreal worlds in search of artifacts. ARENA mode -> Use artifacts to improve combat performance.

name: Disturbed R.I.P.
description: 2.5D Platformer Action-Adventure game. An illusory adventure in the form of a linear uroboric path. Or a short narrative story with platforming elements.

name: Antibody
description: A love letter to ‘80s arcade shooters. Pilot a nimble spacecraft as you balance staying alive, defending friendly critters and fighting an ever-encroaching viral enemy. Upgrade your ship and become Sanguon’s ultimate protector. End the Viroid menace. You are the cure.

name: The Chronicles of Moses and the Exodus
description: Enjoy the classic story of Moses and his quest to lead his people to freedom in the epical match-3 game "The Chronicles of Moses and the Exodus". When Moses flees Egypt after turning against the Pharaoh, he has no idea that God has great plans in store for him...

name: Paradaice
description: PARADAICE is a brutal car combat game in which strategy, fury and behind-the-wheel skill will be essential to eliminate all your enemies. Explore the maps, equip yourself and let the hunt begin! Join the battle with your friends and make them bite the dust (or the road)...

name: Do It With Hay
description: It’s a little funny game, in which you will be a worker on a small farm. You’re going to unload haystacks in time, since the truck driver won't wait long! Although, no one will prevent you from distracting yourself a little and diluting your work days with something funny.

name: Project Wunderwaffe
description: Project Wunderwaffe will take you back into the realities of World War II, the end of which seems to be near. Germany is now just a shadow of its power. Your order is to build a secret military base and construct weapons of unprecedented power. Will you be capable of turning the tide of war?

name: Particubes
description:
Particubes is a free-to-play game creation platform where you can build your own cube-based games, and share them with your friends.

Thanks to its integrated code environment and its voxel editor, you gain the ability to create and edit your games directly on the application, without downloading anything else! Build, test and fix right in the app on your phone or computer.

name: Aka Ninja VR
description: Very bloody and exciting cut people VR game. You can cut enemies at will like in reality. Each level has a large number of ninjas surrounding and attacking you. One person challenges a group of people. You must use excellent swordsmanship to pass the level.

name: Duck Flighting
description: Duck Flighting may just be the ultimate experience in duck hunting simulation! And if it's not ultimate, we definitely guarantee it's an experience of some sort! With guns to fire, ducks to hunt, and a gorgeous nature scene to enjoy, we wish you all a fun time with our little project.

name: Rogue Sweeper
description: In addition to the rules of Minesweeper, we will explore the stage by making good use of the items obtained during the exploration. Various treasures are hidden in the treasure chests along the way. Let's collect treasures steadily in the Unique world of gypsy jazz with stages full of surprises!

name: Alchemist of Pipiforest
description: Alchemist of Pipiforst is a fantasy RPG game where you collect items and perform alchemy. Explore new areas, collect mysterious materials, and solve various quests. A variety of exciting episodes await you.

name: Warspace
description: Experience the thrilling and destructive intergalactic war between two cyborg armies named Maxdimes and Stacross in this science fiction first person shooter game Warspace.

name: Route 66 Simulator
description: Have you ever dreamed about leaving everything behind and setting out on epic road trip across the United States? Get a budget, build your car and make your dream come true! Try to survive in the most famous road in the world!

name: Happy Marriage Project: Starting from 9 Years Old
description: This is a sample game created in "RPG Maker MZ" by Photosho Shokunin. Comical love simulation RPG about a young girl hunting for the ideal husband.

name: Retail Royale
description: A chaotic Battle Royale inside a furniture store where everything is a weapon.

name: Racing Juke
description: Compete against cunning and tough rivals racers out on the race track to prove that you are the fastest!

name: Elixir of Life
description: Fight, loot, craft equipment, collect your heroes and defeat evil! While doing all these, grow crops on your farm, feed your animals, make friends with the towns people, cook food, discover mysteries!

name: Throw Knives
description: Throw Knives is a new casual and addictive retro-style game that will help pass the time at lunch, at work, during insomnia. Its essence is to compete in throwing knives at a tree. Sounds simple, but it's actually not that easy. Try to hit the target without hitting other knives.

name: Zen! Slider
description: A minimalistic puzzle game where you will have to use all of your brain capacity to pass the levels.

name: Fish and Groove
description: How many fishes your rhythm can catch? Help the fisherman (or in this case, cat) to enchant the fishes as he performs beautiful songs inspired by classic Japanese melodies.

name: Construction Worker Simulator
description: Construction Worker Simulator is an ultra-realistic simulation game that let’s the player experience the life of a full-time construction worker. Make the city grow by your own hands!

name: Bots Are Stupid
description: An ultra-precise 2D Platformer where you give Robots instructions instead of directly controlling them.

name: Pizza Empire
description: In this tycoon you’ll start by picking a spot for your pizza place, then hire some staff, contract suppliers and create your first menu. Understand your customers and deal with the mafia to expand. Soon your small pizzeria will grow into a true pizza empire spanning across the city.

name: Practical Shooting Simulator
description: Practical Shooting Simulator – is a simulator for creating stages, planning tactics, and testing abilities in practical shooting.

name: From Day to Day
description: The game "From Day To Day" is a psychological thriller in the first person. You bought a seemingly ordinary abandoned house to start life with a clean slate after the tragic events in your family.

name: Mechanic 8230
description: Mechanic 8230 is an adventure game in the genre of Point-and-click. Help Mechanic find his robot friend RO-2 and unveil secrets about this destroyed world.

name: Mark Twain's Tom Sawyer: Survival Game
description: Mark Twain's Tom Sawyer-based survival game

name: Tasty Arena
description: Tasty Arena is a dynamic First Person Shooter. Choose your arsenal from a multitude of weapons, and face delicious enemies through different destinations.

name: Old Evil
description: It was fall 2018. A group of recruits from a private military organization took a basic combat training in a woodland near Witch Hills. A few days before the end of the training, the squad stopped being in touch. A searching group was sent to their landing place.

name: Sinking Inn
description: A small, lonely boy on a hopeful quest navigates through a dark and dreary motel. Dive into its mysterious, eerie atmosphere and find your way through the motel's strange puzzles, as it becomes increasingly clear that reality is not as it seems.

name: The Sims 4: Bust the Dust Kit
description: Dust off the vacuum and tidy up with The Sims 4: Bust the Dust Kit. Dust is piling up and spawning friendly bunnies and dastardly filth fiends in Sims' homes. Get rid of the muck by cleaning, or settle in for a messy life. Conquer chores with new buffs and rewards for each dust level, vacuums to help fight the good fight, and aspirations related to cleanliness.

name: Anno 1800: Docklands
description:
The 1st DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 3 Pass.

Immerse yourself in the next chapter of the Anno 1800 Industrial Revolution, starting with the DLC Docklands.

name: The Hopebringer
description: The Hopebringer is a storyline driven action RPG featuring procedurally generated dungeons and a skills based leveling system. The last great human settlement has fallen. Mankind's final hope has been rotting away in a cell for the past twenty years, with no memory of their past.

name: Lumexa
description: Lumexa is a Connecting Points Puzzle-game that involves you in a minimalist atmosphere. Enjoy the neon lights and the good vibes in a delightful experience only with hexagon blocks.

name: In Between
description: In Between is a first person story adventure game about a lonely man and his near death experience.

name: Glory Hold
description: Glory Hold is besieged again, sire...Surely you remember you must lead the defense? I can’t wait to see you wielding the Great Bow. Your aim has always been so…magnificent. Yes. Truly remarkable. We have nothing to fear at all I’m sure.

name: Garden City
description: Garden City – an exciting strategy game set in park landscapes.

name: Shoebill
description: Shoebill is a platformer that plunges you into a world called The Void and tells the story of Shiro.

name: The Gap
description: The Gap is a sci-fi first person narrative exploration thriller. You play as Joshua Hayes, a neuroscientist who's lost it all. Your mysterious ability to explore parallel realities through deja vu seems to be the only way to recover your memories and salvage your life.

name: One Try, One Kill
description: One try, one kill - a gory TDS game, in which you must clean the areas of ruthless mercenary. The game is a top-down so you could view the battle situation as it's best.

name: Darkness Arrives
description: A Horror based cartoon style game that has Nightmare levels you need to complete in the right order

name: SuperCTF
description: Team-based ranked multiplayer capture the flag with power-ups and weapons.

name: Zero-G Revolution
description: A single player sci-fi Adventure game for VR device.

name: The Death Into Trouble
description: Help The Death to undo his mess, collect souls between heaven, purgatory and hell. Run, Jump, Hide and Explore!

name: Rythenia
description: A Retro Action-Adventure Role-Playing Game about the journey of four heroes trying to recover an ancient and long lost relic to consecrate the split of Rythenia Empire into four kingdoms for the emperor's heirs.

name: Unlife
description: Survive in a dark world destroyed by a nuclear war, where instead of land only the Black Ocean and its dangerous inhabitants. Navigate a submarine between ocean platforms, search for supplies, and rescue survivors. Try to find a ghostly way to escape from these nightmares!

name: Cold Wind
description: Cold Wind is a first-person game where you are going to experience yourself what it feels like to be homeless. You will be exploring a large winter city looking for food, saving yourself from cold and wind at a fire.

name: Factory of Sweets
description: Factory of Sweets - is a classic "plumber" puzzle game.

name: Mygnar
description: In this top-down action game, you are a mage who seeks knowledge in the depths of a dungeon. Find the keys, unlock new levels and face increasingly powerful monsters. Finish the dungeon and unlock the "Blast Magic" spell! Or just get the highest score.

name: Orange Santa
description: Orange Santa is a 2D Christmas-Themed Platform Action game based on the story of Orange Santa who is in-charge of the distribution of the Christmas gifts among the children.

name: Rogue North
description: A tactical shooter that has you fight to survive against a military occupation as well as a growing nuclear winter. Prepare accordingly, there's a long walk ahead of you.

name: Jad
description: JAD is an atmospheric jumping and puzzle platformer.

name: Tandem: A Tale of Shadows
description: Tandem: A Tale of Shadows redefines the puzzle platformer genre with a unique gameplay and exceptional aesthetics. Help Emma and the teddy bear Fenton solve the mystery of the disappearance of the famous magician Thomas Kane. Players will alternate between Emma’s top-down view and Fenton’s horizontal side-scroller view, using the former’s lantern to cast shadows the teddy bear can cross. In turn, the latter can activate switches that may be out of view.

name: Dungeon Delver
description: Test your mettle by fighting your way through waves of increasingly difficult enemies. Cast spells, earn loot, and upgrade your character to see how far into the dungeon can you delve.

name: Bad Guy Adventure
description: Bad Guy Adventure - Hardcore platformer with shooter elements, where the player appears on a level full of monsters, clearing which he can go to the next level, which becomes more difficult every time.

name: Fly the Cloud
description: Ride on a cloud, fly freely in the sky. Just stand on the cloud and you can control it by changing your position. dodging various obstacles, reach the goal in limited time. Support up to 4 local players racing in splict screen mode.

name: Sin Survivor
description: Sin Survivor is a wave-based, first-person co-operative or single-player shooter based in a post-apocalyptic world overrun with blood-hungry, satanic demons.

name: Shodo
description: Be the master of your martial art. Enter the universe of psychic command of Chaos Magic, where your in-game strength relies solely on your strength within. Combine creativity and strategy to engineer the perfect combat art, and command your style to victory in a VR experience unlike any other.

name: Gunborg: Dark Matters
description: Gunborg: Dark Matters is an action arcade platformer. Take on an army of alien soldiers and killer robots while making your way through a giant spaceship.

name: BangBangShooting
description: Players play the role of an amnesia "exile", looking for their own past in the end of the world. Gradually awaken your ability in the battle, collect and upgrade all kinds of powerful weapons to defeat the enemy blocking the way!

name: Gonne Wrong
description: Its a zombie mode action fps shooter game based on stunning story.

name: Kredolis
description: The fall of Atlantis has left a small island unsunken and a mysterious institute has taken hold. You have shipwrecked and found yourself lost between esoteric and mystical puzzles. Find your way home or enter the sunken lighthouse into the depths of Atlantis.

name: Living the Nightmare
description: Living the Nightmare is a fast-paced, turn-based, Horror Roguelike about a Slasher who just met his end. Be the Faceless, a Killer slain by a would-be victim and cast into a dark, purgatorial realm. There may be a way out... but there's a lot of monsters to turn inside out first.

name: Mars Colony Builder
description: Discover a whole new world with Mars City Builder! Construct roads, erect buildings customize the city and take care of its safety. After all, you are the first Martian settler and this is a vast, unknown land. Develop it in any way you please!

name: Orb Overload
description: Go on a adventure through outer space in Orb Overload. Play, make and discover planets in this journey to get back to your ship while not dying from oxygen by connecting to Orbs!

name: Speedpunk
description: Welcome to the future. In the world where cars are flying. Pickup helmet, fasten your seat belts and fly as fast as you can. Race on different planets. Earn as much stars as you can in each level. Beat other players and become most popular flying car driver. Take your car, it is free-to-play.

name: King and Country
description: King and Country is an ambitious Real-Time Strategy game set during the bloodiest time in all of human history. Massive regimes spread their forces like wildfire as players fight a war the likes of which humanity has never seen since.

name: Puppy Pipy
description: Puppy Pipy is a 2D action puzzle platformer, each stage focuses on a specific physical property as its core gameplay, such as gravity, bounce, rotation, fluid, and lift. This game has a heartwarming story which is about a 6 week old golden retriever puppy named Pipy looking for his young owner.

name: The Sundew
description: You are Anna Isobe, a cyborg cop abandoned by progress and thrust into the midst of a global conspiracy. Experience classic point and click gameplay as you travel across the dark future, and make choices that will seal the fate of the world.

name: Warlike
description: Lead your band of mercenaries to victory in a procedurally generated fantasy world. Manage your resources, customise your army and wage epic battles against orc clans, barbarian hordes and legions of the undead. The art style may be cute, but this tactical roguelike is anything but forgiving.

name: Trapmania
description: Run, Trap, Defend. Fearsome monsters have invaded! Your job? Cleanse the land of these horrible beasts using only your mind, and the traps in your backpack...

name: Shattered Runes
description: Shattered Runes is a fast-FPS in which you fight your enemies with magic. Choose from 186 unique spells to shape your own playstyle and defeat your opponents.

name: Touch the Floor
description: A casual, short-burst and fast-paced game where the goal is to keep touching the floor, while blocks keep spawning beneath you. Click them to break them and drop down.

name: Evade the Light
description: It is a dark sci-fi FPS, where the main character must find answers to the mysteries of his past in a mysterious anomalous zone, simultaneously fighting the monsters that live there.

name: King of Cooking
description: Do you want to have your own food truck? You want to expand your business? Do you like tycoon games? Then, this is the perfect game for you!

name: Monark
description:
Monark, the “new school RPG” from former Megami Tensei and Shin Megami Tensei staff, will launch for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on October 14 in Japan.

The story follows the True Student Council, which was established to solve the abnormal situations in the school. The protagonist, who becomes the deputy head of the council, chooses a buddy from four characters to defy the unreasonable.

The main story has multiple endings. There are different routes for each of the four buddy characters. To make multiple playthroughs easier, you can also skip shared routes and advance through different buddy routes.

Battles are command-based with a free move turn system. Increasing your madness will allow you to use more powerful skills, but if you increase it too much, you will go insane and rampage against targets both friend and foe, making it impossible to fight.

There is also an “EGO” system, which represents the player’s desire levels of pride, wrath, envy, lust, gluttony, and sloth. These change depending on your diagnosis and the choices you make, and also affect the demons you can employ as your “underlings.”

name: Pettan Pyuu
description: "Pettan Pyuu" is an action game released by SUNSOFT in 1984. Take control of the character, "Pettan" and make use of the plates to wipe out bugs and solve the interdimensional maze. You will need to master 4 different types of plates, all with their own characteristics.

name: Biota
description: Biota is a 2D metroidvania inspired shooter set on a wild and dangerous sci-fi, pixel-art planet. Get ready to face hostile alien life forms and investigate a mysterious mining colony as a group of ragtag heroes from the future, all in glorious 4-color palettes and detailed 8-bit visuals.

name: Akumajou Densetsu
description: Akumajou Densetsu is the Japanese version of Castlevania III: Dracula's Curse. This version has many differences in gameplay and level layout, making the overall experience easier than its western counterpart.

name: Draco
description: The player controls the movement of his Humanoid by moving it across the surface of a strange planet (Draco), whose treasures (points) are guarded by robots. The Humanoid must appropriate the treasures of Draco by knocking down the obstacles that protect them and defending themselves from the Draco robots that lie in wait for him. For this it has its laser beam, and a limited dose of energy.

name: Arcade Archives: Hacha Mecha Fighter
description: Hacha Mecha Fighter is a shooting game released by NMK in 1991. Control Kawauso and Tsuchibuta as they fly forward on airplanes and defeat enemies along the way. It's a great, easy game to get into, even for players who don't often play shooting games, but still poses enough of a challenge to keep fans of the genre interested!

name: Scoober Splat!
description: A chaotic action party game where you chase your friends! Pick your Goober and kill Scoobers, who are defending themselves with powerups. No betrayals or meetings, just running and screaming! With a free-to-play browser demo, easily invite your friends to join a game, no downloads required!

name: Succubus Farm
description: A dungeon escape, action game. Play as a captured human forced to work for demons, but one day you decide to make a mad dash for freedom!

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Organic Stone Honpen
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Organic Stone Honpen is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Ryouma de Yuku
description: RPG Tsukuuru 2 Taiou: Ryouma de Yuku is a game released as an add-on via the Satellaview for the slotted cartridge game RPG Tsukuuru 2, released for the Super Famicom.

name: Salt 2: Shores of Gold
description: Salt 2 is an open world pirate exploration and survival game set in an infinite procedural world. Set sail with just you and your ship across the sea and explore islands filled with caves, ancient ruins, pirates, and more. Hunt, fish, explore, loot, craft, and decorate your ship during your journey.

name: BlosamAO
description: BlosamAO is an Argentum Online server, active intermittently since 2010. It is a shake server, in which the maximum level is reached quickly and then take advantage of all the systems that exist ingame.

name: A Robot's Journey
description: Embark on A Robot's Journey to becoming a parent and reflecting on childhood memories. Traverse and explore lush landscapes while collecting energy, gathering fragments, overcoming obstacles, and solving puzzles in this 3rd person, exploration, puzzle adventure.

name: Endless Zombie Tower
description: Hard single/coop roguelike-strategy-shooter game. Reach top of randomized tower-building and kill all zombies alone or as team (8 players).

name: Pillow Bellow
description: Have you ever wonder why you have bad sleep? In Pillow Bellow you will take a role as a Pillow that have to save humans from bad sleep. But the path will be not easy. There are unique traps, secrets and skins for you to find. Lets save the Pillow World!

name: Desert Raider
description: Desert Raider is a VR action shooting game set-in a post-apocalyptic era. You and your pal Doug are asked to find an unidentified container somewhere in the radioactive zone and deliver it to your boss. Enemy drones are everywhere. Will you survive and complete this last job?

name: Resthedex
description: Build some buildings, level up, drive vehicles and enjoy the ride but don't ever forget the protection! When the countdown begins on clocktower, you are going to need to act fast!When the countdown ends you'll face against enemies which will destroy your city unless you take some precautions!

name: Brandins Buttons
description: Challenge yourself with over 110 increasingly difficult logic puzzles in this classic button pressing game. Explore each one in Free Play Mode or attempt to solve them in Move Limit or Off Only modes. Random Mode lets you create custom puzzles of any size.

name: Jennifer Wilde: Unlikely Revolutionaries
description: In 1921, young French artist Jennifer Chevalier becomes embroiled in death, espionage and revolution, assisted by the ghost of Oscar Wilde. A hand-drawn Point & Click adventure with a unique comic book inventory design.

name: Brisk Square
description: Future! In the wake of a cataclysm! You are the prey in a world full of hunters. Run, overpower them and free the violent streets in this intensively fast-paced cyber adventure. Be the last stand in an infinite run gameplay by starting with a simple blade and evolve to unlock more advanced weapons.

name: Hyper Strike
description: Hyper Strike is a space shooter on rails with a rogue like twist. Explore the outer space colonies, battle in scenarios, and take on bosses while unlocking upgrades and slowly gaining strength to take on bigger foes.

name: Mind Shadows
description: Mind Shadows is the first standalone game that my friend and I have made since graduating. It is a short psychological horror experience set in the 1980s. You will see multiple cinematic locations in First Person as you slowly gather hints to what is going on.

name: Starshot
description: Starshot is a difficult space shoot-em-up with rogue-like elements and randomly generated levels. Will you be able to upgrade your ship and pilot it to safety, or be destroyed in your search for stardust inside the automated production facility?

name: Causality
description: Causality is a survival horror game. You must rescue 3 students trapped in a school full of mysterious psychic phenomena, and uncover the secrets behind therein. The real story behind the school, and the causal relationship of the events, is all in your hands.

name: End of Days
description: End of Days is an open world horror survival game set in a time where a virus has mutated human beings into the “infected”. A world where players must work together to survive or eliminate the other survivors.

name: A Walk With Yiayia
description: A Walk with Yiayia is a light adventure game/visual novel about taking your Greek grandmother on a walk after she's lost her confidence from having a scary fall. Connect through engaging conversations, explore a relaxing environment, and complete microquests in this thoughtful, bite-sized adventure.

name: LetterBound
description: A cooperative spelling adventure playable with to 4 friends!

name: Parking Attendant
description: Parking Attendant is an arcade game with a top view, where the player has to Park the car and collect all the stars, avoiding obstacles.

name: Barry the Bunny
description: A 2D platformer with short challenging levels about a bunny who builds bridges.

name: Synth War Tactics
description: A cyber punk turn-based tactics game, customize your team of elite soldiers and lead them to victory across endless battlefields.

name: Underponder
description: Underponder is a first-person puzzle/platformer PC-game with a weird and haunting atmosphere, invoking feelings of being lost and alone while wandering in a strange “mindspace” only known as The Underponder.

name: Daardoa
description: Atmospheric and surreal horror game about day and night cycle.

name: Haunted Hotel: Phoenix - Collector's Edition
description: Uncover the truth behind the legendary fire that destroyed a university.

name: A Warmer Shade of Summer
description: You return to the family farm to find it in disrepair. Maybe you have what it takes to bring it back to its former glory? Who knows who you'll meet on you're way? An old friend? That special someone? Anything is possible in Summerset.

name: Raze 2070
description: RAZE 2070 is a science fiction FPS shooter brought to life with the latest Unreal Engine 4 graphics brought to life. Gather your weapons and get ready for endless waves of robots that want to kill you. Hold the line! Achieve Steam achievements and get the highest score!

name: Warhammer Quest: Silver Tower
description: Bite sized turn-based strategy battles in a Tower of pure Chaos! Dive into one of our huge campaigns, or jump in to a Daily Quest. 20+ Champions from the Age of Sigmar to collect, each with unique gameplay, weapons and skills. Can you take on the Trials of the Summoner?

name: Jigoku Unko
description: Our character has a tantrum after eating spicy Adana Kebab. Then he finds himself in hell for some unknown reason.

name: Infiltration: Alone in Combat
description: A Third Person Shooter Game where you have to infiltrate the enemy lines and complete the mission.

name: 1917: The Prologue
description: 1917: The Prologue is a psychological horror game with elements of an escape room. All events in the game are occuring during the October Revolution in 1917 in Russia. The game is based on memories of those who survived in this dark time.

name: Orange Cast: Prologue
description: Prologue to Orange Cast, an atmospheric adventure in a large-scale setting where Soviet and Western science fiction are combined itself. As a humanity’s elite space trooper, you take on a heroic, action-packed adventure throughout the galaxy.

name: Brick Breaker Unicorn
description: Brick Breaker Unicorn is a classic arcade game with interesting graphics and unicorn themed.The game is based on the classic "Arknoid" game.Arkanoid is a video slot machine game developed by Taito in 1986.

name: Legend of Heroes: Eternal Arena
description: This ancient land is full of blood and rancidity. The devils hunt humans and convert them into demon. Watching the devastating tragedy, survivors formed a team to hunt demons and save other survivors. From then on, the heroes started an endless fighting with devils...

name: Armored
description: It's time for you to prove yourself in the management of armored vehicles. You have to perform many operations from liberating the territory to escorting VIP and battling against enemy armored vehicles.

name: Fairy Godmother Stories: Puss in Boots Collector's Edition
description: The Ministry of Discipline needs you, Fairy Godmother!

name: Gloom
description: Classed based arena shooter/strategy hybrid for Quake II that pits aliens against humans. Draws many parallels to the Half-Life TC Natural Selection.

name: Anno 1800: Tourist Season
description:
The 2nd DLC of the Anno 1800 Season 3 Pass.

Turn your cities into prime travel destinations with hotels to attract the new Tourist residential tier.

name: Beastrun
description:
Beastrun is a game about building a party that synergizes.

Create a team, equip items and skills and watch how your team does against the teams of other players.

name: Bibi & Tina: Mikoschs großer Auftritt
description: Help Bibi and Tina organize an exciting horse show and expose the unscrupulous horse thief! The two friends get a visit from Mikosch, the young horse herdsman from the Puszta. Mikosch is to appear at the castle festival of Count Falko von Falkenstein with his great riding show. But someone is after his horse Baboschko and wants to steal it. The horse-loving user has the task of finding out with the help of Bibi and Tina who wants to kidnap Baboschko and for what reason. In eleven minigames with two different levels of difficulty, the user has to take care of Baboschko, train him for show riding or find Baboschko's horse pass.

name: Compilation Assassin's Creed: Brotherhood + Revelations
description: Sin descripción

name: Horse Life 3
description: Sin descripción
